name: Moetale
description:
Someone named Moe shows up at your house and catches you in a fight to the death. This is a small recreation of undertale sans battle created in a week.

🎨 Art by Moe.

🎵Music by Nabo.

💻Programming by Luife (me).

Move: Arrows.

Interact: x, z or space.

Switch fullscreen/window: F5

 I hope you enjoy it and report any errors to me quickly. Thanks
